scripts.test-all: rm -rf output && yarn build-tests && yarn tests && yarn build-app-tests && yarn app-tests
scripts.clean-app: rm -rf dist/app && mkdir -p dist/app && cp -r fluid dist/app && cp web/index.html dist/app && cp -r web/css dist/app
scripts.build-app: yarn clean-app && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main App.Main --to dist/app/app.js
scripts.clean-tests: rm -rf dist/tests && mkdir -p dist/tests && cp web/tests.html dist/tests
scripts.clean-bench: rm -rf dist/benches && mkdir -p dist/benches && cp web/tests.html dist/benches
scripts.build-tests: yarn clean-tests && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main Test.Main --to dist/tests/app.js
scripts.build-bench: yarn clean-bench && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main Test.Benchmark --to dist/benches/app.js --platform=node
scripts.clean-app-tests: rm -rf dist/app-tests && mkdir -p dist/app-tests && cp web/tests.html dist/app-tests
scripts.build-app-tests: yarn clean-app-tests && spago build --purs-args '--strict --censor-codes=UserDefinedWarning' && purs-backend-es bundle-app --main Test.App.Main --to dist/app-tests/app.js
scripts.tidy: yarn purs-tidy format-in-place src/*.purs src/App/**/*.purs src/**/*.purs test/*.purs test/**/*.purs
